ground_truth: He squirts some wiper fluid onto the glass, which clears it up a bit, but now he sees something worse up ahead. It's a grouping of headlights, eight of them, all pointed at him, sealing off the road. He bites his lip and calls over his shoulder, to the back of the van. He speaks in Spanish, which is subtitled. The Agents fling open the rear doors, revealing a dozen frightened Mexicans, hopeful immigrants without official permission. Agent Janus looks at the Driver, who's now held by two other Agents, and shakes his head. He stops in the middle of his sentence, as another car is approaching, fast, its engine whining as it barrels down the road toward them. The new car pulls a hard right, goes off the road, spins around the INS cars, and squeals to a sideways halt, silhouetted in front of their headlights. It's a boxy, black 1986 Ford LTD. Two men get out, dressed in plain black suits, crisp white shirts, simple black ties, shiny black shoes. Kay, fiftyish, is the apotheosis of world-weary; his partner, Dee, mid-sixties, is just weary. They approach the INS agents. Kay and Dee move past him and approach the row of nervous immigrants. He walks down the row, studying the faces, greeting each one cheerily in Spanish. Silence on the road. The others pile into the rear and they tear out of there. Kay and Dee escort their captive across the road and over a small rise, leaving the stunned INS agents standing alone in the roadway. He pulls out a small laser device, which he zips neatly down the front of the man's clothes. The man's clothes fall to the ground, revealing what he really is underneath—a scaly space bastard, about four-and-a-half feet tall, with a snout, snail-like tentacles, and independently moving eyes on stalks at the top of his head. It's propped up by a stick, like a puppet, and it continues to make expressions as he holds it. Mikey replies—an unfathomable combination of grunts, squeaks, and saliva. Mikey makes a lame squeak. From behind Mikey, they hear a terrified gasp. Kay and Dee both look over quickly. One of the alien's eyes, on a tall stalk, whips around too. All three of them see Agent Janus, standing just over the rise, staring in frozen amazement. Janus freezes, terrified. Dee struggles to roll over and change the controls on his gun, which fell out of his hand as he hit the ground. The other INS agents burst over the rise, shouting questions. From over the rise, car engines whine in the distance and headlights start to flash around them. Kay reaches into his pocket and pulls out a tubular metallic device the size of a pocket recorder.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: He sprays some washer liquid onto the pane, which clears it up a bit, but now he notices something worse up ahead. It's a cluster of headlamps, eight of them, all directed at him, blocking off the route. He nibbles his lip and calls over his shoulder, to the back of the vehicle. He converses in Spanish, which is subtitled. The Officers fling open the rear doors, uncovering a dozen frightened Mexicans, hopeful migrants without official authorization. Officer Janus glances at the Chauffeur, who's now held by two other Officers, and shakes his head. He halts in the middle of his utterance, as another auto is nearing, fast, its motor whining as it barrels down the route toward them. The new auto pulls a hard right, goes off the route, spins around the INS autos, and squeals to a sideways stop, silhouetted in front of their headlamps. It's a boxy, black 1986 Ford LTD. Two men exit, dressed in plain black attire, crisp white blouses, simple black neckties, shiny black footwear. Kay, fiftyish, is the epitome of world-weary; his comrade, Dee, mid-sixties, is just weary. They proceed to the INS officers. Kay and Dee move past him and approach the row of nervous migrants. He walks down the row, examining the visages, greeting each one cheerily in Spanish. Quiet on the route. The others pile into the rear and they speed out of there. Kay and Dee escort their captive across the route and over a small rise, leaving the stunned INS officers standing solitary in the roadway. He extracts a small laser gadget, which he zips neatly down the front of the man's garments. The man’s garments tumble to the ground, uncovering what he truly is beneath—a scaly extraterrestrial rascal, about four-and-a-half feet tall, with a snout, snail-like appendages, and independently moving eyes on stalks at the top of his head. It's propped up by a stick, like a marionette, and it continues to make expressions as he holds it. Mikey replies—an inscrutable combination of grunts, squeaks, and spittle. Mikey makes a feeble squeak. From behind Mikey, they catch a terrified gasp. Kay and Dee both glance over swiftly. One of the alien's eyes, on a tall stalk, whips around too. All three of them witness Officer Janus, standing just over the rise, staring in frozen wonder. Janus freezes, petrified. Dee struggles to roll over and alter the controls on his firearm, which fell out of his hand as he hit the ground. The other INS officers burst over the rise, shouting inquiries. From over the rise, auto engines whine in the distance and headlamps start to flicker around them. Kay reaches into his pocket and pulls out a tubular metallic device the size of a pocket recorder.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He squirts wiper fluid on the glass, clearing it slightly, but then spots something worse: a blockade of eight headlights. Calling to the van's back, he speaks in subtitled Spanish. Agents open the rear doors, revealing a dozen frightened, hopeful Mexican immigrants without permission. Agent Janus glances at the Driver, now held by two Agents, and shakes his head, stopping as another car approaches rapidly. It veers off-road, spins around the INS cars, and halts sideways, silhouetted against headlights. Two men exit, wearing plain black suits, white shirts, black ties, and shiny shoes. Kay, fiftyish, is world-weary; Dee, mid-sixties, is just weary. They approach INS agents, then move to the immigrants, studying and greeting each in Spanish. Silence prevails as the others pile into the rear and drive off. Kay and Dee escort their captive across the road, leaving stunned INS agents behind. Kay uses a laser device to reveal the man's true form—a scaly alien, four-and-a-half feet tall, with a snout, tentacles, and eyes on stalks. It's puppet-like and continues expressing emotions. Mikey responds with grunts, squeaks, and saliva. From behind, they hear a gasp. All three turn to see Agent Janus, frozen in terror. Dee struggles to adjust his gun, which fell. INS agents arrive, shouting. Engines whine and headlights flash around. Kay pulls a tubular metallic device from his pocket.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: He squirts wiper fluid on the glass, partially clearing it, but then notices eight headlights ahead, blocking the road. He bites his lip, calls to the van's back in Spanish, with subtitles. The Agents open the rear doors, revealing a dozen frightened Mexican immigrants without official permission. Agent Janus looks at the Driver, held by two Agents, shaking his head. He halts mid-sentence as a car speeds toward them, its engine whining. The new car veers right, spins around the INS cars, halting sideways in front of the headlights. It's a black 1986 Ford LTD. Two men exit, in black suits, white shirts, black ties, and shiny shoes. Kay, world-weary, and Dee, weary, approach the INS agents, then the row of immigrants. Kay greets each cheerily in Spanish. Silence reigns. The others pile into the rear, speeding away. Kay and Dee escort their captive across the road, leaving stunned INS agents. He uses a laser device to zip down the man's clothes, revealing a four-and-a-half-foot scaly alien with a snout, tentacles, and eye stalks. It remains puppet-like and expressive. Mikey responds with grunts and squeaks. They hear a terrified gasp behind Mikey. Kay and Dee swiftly look, with one alien eye whipping around. All see Agent Janus, amazed and frozen. Dee struggles to adjust his gun's controls, dropped upon hitting the ground. Other INS agents arrive, questioning. Engines whine distantly, headlights flash. Kay retrieves a tubular metallic device from his pocket.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He carefully squirts some wiper fluid onto the dusty glass windshield, which manages to clear it up slightly, but his relief is short-lived, as he now perceives something far more alarming up ahead. It is a grouping of bright headlights, eight in total, all ominously pointed directly at him, effectively sealing off the road and blocking his path. Feeling the tension escalate, he nervously bites his lip and calls over his shoulder, addressing the occupants in the back of the van. He speaks in Spanish, his words helpfully subtitled for clarity. In response, the Agents swiftly fling open the rear doors, revealing a dozen frightened individuals—Mexicans who are hopeful immigrants, but without the official permission they need. Agent Janus glances at the Driver, who is now restrained by two other Agents, and shakes his head in disapproval. Cutting off his sentence midway, he stops abruptly as another car approaches at rapid speed, its engine whining loudly as it barrels down the road towards them. The new vehicle executes a hard right turn, veers off the road, and spins around the INS cars with precision, coming to a dramatic sideways halt, silhouetted against their glaring headlights. It is a boxy, black 1986 Ford LTD. Two men emerge from the car, dressed sharply in plain black suits, complemented by crisp white shirts, simple black ties, and shiny black shoes. Kay, who is in his fifties, embodies the essence of world-weariness; his partner, Dee, who is in his mid-sixties, just appears worn out. They approach the INS agents purposefully. Kay and Dee continue past him and move towards the row of nervous immigrants. Kay walks down the line, scrutinizing each face, and greets each one cheerfully in Spanish. A deep silence envelops the road. The others hastily pile into the rear of the vehicle, and they tear out of there with urgency. Kay and Dee escort their captive across the road and over a small rise, leaving the stunned INS agents standing in disbelief in the middle of the roadway. Kay then pulls out a small, laser-like device, swiftly and precisely zipping it down the front of the man's clothes. The man's clothes fall away to the ground, revealing his true form underneath—a scaly space creature, about four-and-a-half feet in height, with a distinct snout, snail-like appendages, and eyes that move independently on stalks positioned at the top of his head. The creature is propped up by a stick, resembling a puppet, and continues to express itself as Kay holds it. Mikey responds—a bewildering blend of grunts, squeaks, and saliva. Mikey emits a feeble squeak. From behind Mikey, they catch the sound of a terrified gasp. Kay and Dee both quickly turn to look. One of the alien's eyes, perched on a tall stalk, whips around in response. All three of them witness Agent Janus, standing just over the rise, wide-eyed and frozen in astonishment. Janus stands paralyzed in fear. Dee struggles to roll over and adjust the controls on his gun, which had slipped from his grasp when he hit the ground. The other INS agents burst over the rise, shouting questions in a flurry. From beyond the rise, car engines whine persistently in the distance, and headlights begin to flash chaotically around them. Kay reaches into his pocket and retrieves a tubular metallic device, about the size of a pocket recorder, ready for what comes next.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: He methodically squirts an ample amount of wiper fluid onto the dusty, clouded glass windshield. While this action manages to clear it up slightly, providing him with a marginally improved view, his sense of relief is fleeting. The momentary clarity reveals something far more alarming up ahead. It is a foreboding sight—a grouping of bright headlights, precisely eight in total, ominously aligned and pointed directly towards him. This arrangement effectively seals off the road, creating a barrier that completely blocks his intended path. As the tension escalates, he finds himself nervously biting his lip and urgently calls over his shoulder, addressing the occupants situated in the back of the van. He speaks rapidly in Spanish, his plea helpfully subtitled for clarity. In response to his call, the Agents hastily fling open the rear doors of the van, revealing a dozen terrified individuals—Mexicans who are hopeful immigrants but are notably lacking the official permission they desperately need. Agent Janus turns his gaze towards the Driver, who is now being firmly restrained by two other Agents, and shakes his head in disapproval. Abruptly, his sentence is cut off midway as another car rapidly approaches, its engine whining loudly as it barrels down the road towards them. The new vehicle executes a hard right turn, veers decisively off the road, and spins around the cluster of INS cars with remarkable precision, coming to a dramatic sideways halt that silhouettes it against their glaring headlights. It is a boxy, black 1986 Ford LTD. Two men emerge from this car, dressed impeccably in plain black suits complemented by crisp white shirts, simple black ties, and shiny black shoes. Kay, who is in his fifties, exudes an air of world-weariness, while his partner, Dee, who is in his mid-sixties, appears simply worn out. They both approach the cluster of INS agents with a purposeful stride. Kay and Dee continue past them, moving directly towards the line of nervous immigrants. Kay walks steadily down the line, scrutinizing each face with care, and greets each individual cheerfully in Spanish. A profound silence envelops the road, creating a pocket of tension. The others hastily pile into the rear of their vehicle, and they tear out of there with a sense of urgency. Kay and Dee then escort their captive across the road, leading him over a small rise, effectively leaving the stunned INS agents standing in disbelief in the middle of the roadway. Exhibiting a quiet efficiency, Kay retrieves a small device, resembling a laser, and swiftly, with great precision, zips it down the front of the man's clothes. The man's clothes fall away to the ground, unveiling his true form beneath—a scaly space creature, approximately four-and-a-half feet in height. This creature boasts a distinct snout, snail-like appendages, and eyes that move independently on stalks positioned at the top of its head. The creature is propped up by a stick, oddly resembling a puppet, and continues to express itself animatedly as Kay holds it. The creature, known as Mikey, emits a bewildering blend of grunts, squeaks, and inadvertently, saliva. Mikey utters a feeble squeak. From somewhere behind Mikey, they catch the unmistakable sound of a terrified gasp. Kay and Dee both quickly turn to look, their attention drawn to the sound. One of the alien's eyes, perched on a tall stalk, whips around responsively. Together, all three of them witness Agent Janus, standing just over the rise, wide-eyed and frozen in a state of astonishment. Janus stands paralyzed in fear, unable to move. Meanwhile, Dee struggles to roll over and adjust the controls on his gun, which had frustratingly slipped from his grasp when he hit the ground. In a sudden burst of action, the other INS agents surge over the rise, shouting questions in a flurry of confusion. From beyond the rise, car engines persistently whine in the distance, and headlights begin to flash chaotically around them. With a calm sense of readiness, Kay reaches into his pocket and retrieves a tubular metallic device, roughly the size of a pocket recorder, preparing himself for what is about to unfold next.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As the windshield of the van becomes clouded with grime, he deftly reaches for the wiper control, taking a moment to aim and pump a precise amount of wiper fluid onto the glass, watching as the liquid spreads and clears it up slightly. However, his relief is short-lived, for through the now clearer glass, his eyes catch a sight that sends a jolt of apprehension through him—a menacing cluster of headlights, eight in total, shining relentlessly and effectively creating a blockade across the road ahead. Feeling the pressure of the situation, he bites his lip in contemplation and turns his head back over his shoulder, casting his voice to the rear of the van where his companions reside. He speaks, his words flowing in Spanish, their meaning made clear through subtitles that follow the rapid dialogue. In response to his urgent summons, the Agents stationed at the back of the van swiftly fling open its doors, revealing the faces of a dozen terrified Mexicans, individuals filled with the hope of finding a new life despite the absence of official permissions. Agent Janus, observing the tense scene, turns his gaze upon the Driver, noting how he is now restrained by the firm grips of two other Agents, shaking his head in disapproval. Mid-sentence, Janus is abruptly cut off by the distant roar of an engine, the unsettling sound growing louder as a car approaches with formidable speed, its engine howling in protest as it barrels relentlessly down the road towards them. In a daring maneuver, the new car veers sharply to the right, careening off the road, whirling around the INS vehicles, and screeching to a dramatic halt, coming to rest sideways and casting its silhouette in the glare of the headlights. The car, a strikingly boxy and black 1986 Ford LTD, stands intimidating in its posture. From its confines emerge two men, their attire simple yet foreboding—plain black suits, crisp white shirts, understated black ties, and polished black shoes. Among them is Kay, whose fifty-something visage carries the weight of worldly exhaustion, while his partner, Dee, in his mid-sixties, exudes a more straightforward weariness. With purpose, they stride towards the INS agents, their presence commanding attention. As they proceed, Kay and Dee pass by the agents, directing their focus to the line of anxious immigrants, their eyes scanning the faces as Kay makes a point to greet each one in Spanish, his tone surprisingly affable despite the tension. The atmosphere on the road hangs in silence, anticipation thick in the air as their actions unfold. With practiced efficiency, the others clamber into the rear of the vehicle, and their moment of hesitation dissipates as they speed away from the scene. Kay and Dee maintain their measured pace as they escort the captive across the roadway and over a subtle rise in the landscape, leaving behind a scene marked by the stunned stillness of the INS agents, now statuesque in their place on the road. Reaching into his pocket, Kay extracts a compact laser device, its design sleek and metallic, which he deftly employs, drawing a clean line down the fabric of the man's attire, causing the clothes to fall away and reveal the true nature concealed beneath—a bizarre creature, scaly and alien, standing about four-and-a-half feet tall, with a peculiar snout and tentacles akin to those of a snail, eyes perched on stalks that move independently atop its head. The alien, resembling a puppet propped up by a stick, continues to exhibit expressions even as Kay retains his grasp. In reply to their inquiry, Mikey, the alien, emits an unearthly series of grunts, squeaks, and saliva-filled sounds, his attempt at communication a mystery of its own. Mikey’s efforts culminate in a feeble squeak, an expression of his discomfort or unease. Suddenly, from behind Mikey, a frightened gasp slices through the air, drawing the immediate attention of Kay and Dee, who snap their heads around swiftly. Mirroring their reaction, one of the alien’s eye stalks performs a rapid turn to align with their new focus. Aligning their gazes, they all witness Agent Janus, located just over the rise, his expression frozen in sheer awe and terror as he processes the extraordinary sight before him. Janus remains immobilized by shock, his body betraying his fear. Amidst the chaos, Dee struggles, his movements labored as he attempts to roll over, reaching to adjust the settings on his firearm, which slipped from his grasp during his initial fall to the ground. Their moment is interrupted when the remaining INS agents crest the rise, their presence announced by a chorus of shouted inquiries, their voices tinged with urgency and confusion. As their questions reverberate through the air, the distant hum of car engines rises, the headlights around them beginning to flash sporadically, increasing the sense of pandemonium. Amidst the escalating chaos, Kay maintains his composure, reaching into his pocket to retrieve a tubular metallic device, its size reminiscent of a pocket recorder, an object whose purpose remains to be revealed.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: The Driver attempts to clear his windshield with wiper fluid, but soon notices a blockade of cars ahead, each with headlights aimed directly at him. He nervously alerts his passengers, a group of hopeful yet unauthorized Mexican immigrants. Meanwhile, Agent Janus observes the Driver, who is restrained by fellow agents. Their attention is diverted as a fast-approaching car navigates off-road and maneuvers around the blockade, coming to a dramatic stop. From the black 1986 Ford LTD emerge two men in matching black suits, Kay and Dee. With an air of quiet authority, they approach the nervous immigrants, greeting each with a friendly acknowledgment in Spanish. As silence envelops the scene, the agents swiftly evacuate the area with the immigrants, leaving the bewildered INS agents behind. Kay and Dee escort their captive over a small rise, revealing the alien's true form underneath his human disguise. Holding a small laser device, Kay unveils the creature—a four-and-a-half-foot scaly alien, supported like a puppet. The alien, Mikey, communicates through a bizarre mix of sounds, prompting an astonished reaction from Agent Janus, who stands transfixed. Dee hurriedly adjusts his fallen weapon's controls as more INS agents, with car engines heard nearby, rush over the rise. Amid the chaos, Kay calmly retrieves a small tubular device from his pocket.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He squirts some wiper fluid, a mix typically made of water and cleaning agents designed to clear dirt and debris, onto the glass, which clears it up a bit, but now he sees something worse up ahead. It's a grouping of headlights, eight of them, all pointed at him, sealing off the road, likely a deliberate roadblock by law enforcement. He bites his lip and calls over his shoulder, to the back of the van carrying a sensitive cargo. He speaks in Spanish, which is subtitled for non-native speakers. The Agents fling open the rear doors, revealing a dozen frightened Mexicans, hopeful immigrants seeking a better life in the United States but lacking official permission or documentation. Agent Janus, an officer tasked with enforcing immigration laws, looks at the Driver, who's now held by two other Agents, and shakes his head. He stops in the middle of his sentence, as another car is approaching, fast, its engine whining like a mechanical beast unleashed as it barrels down the road toward them. The new car, a vintage vehicle known for its durable design, pulls a hard right, goes off the road, spins around the INS cars, and squeals to a sideways halt, silhouetted in front of their headlights. It's a boxy, black 1986 Ford LTD, a model popular among government agencies in the past decade. Two men get out, dressed in plain black suits, crisp white shirts, simple black ties, shiny black shoes, resembling stereotypical federal agents. Kay, fiftyish, exemplifies the weary persona of a veteran in clandestine operations; his partner, Dee, mid-sixties, is just weary from years of unseen battles. They approach the INS agents, individuals responsible for immigration enforcement. Kay and Dee move past him and approach the row of nervous immigrants, their expressions a mix of hope and fear. He walks down the row, studying the faces, greeting each one cheerily in Spanish, a language he likely mastered out of necessity for his line of work. Silence on the road. The others pile into the rear, and they tear out of there, escaping the immediate danger. Kay and Dee escort their captive across the road and over a small rise, leaving the stunned INS agents standing alone in the roadway, bewildered by the sudden shift in events. He pulls out a small laser device, which he zips neatly down the front of the man's clothes. The man's clothes fall to the ground, revealing what he really is underneath—a scaly space bastard, an alien creature about four-and-a-half feet tall, with a snout, snail-like tentacles, and independently moving eyes on stalks at the top of his head, a bizarre combination of earth and extraterrestrial characteristics. It's propped up by a stick, like a puppet manipulated by invisible strings, and it continues to make expressions as he holds it. Mikey replies—an unfathomable combination of grunts, squeaks, and saliva, none of which resemble terrestrial languages. Mikey makes a lame squeak. From behind Mikey, they hear a terrified gasp. Kay and Dee both look over quickly, their instincts honed by years of unexpected encounters. One of the alien's eyes, on a tall stalk, whips around too, emphasizing its heightened awareness. All three of them see Agent Janus, standing just over the rise, staring in frozen amazement, unable to process the reality unfolding before him. Janus freezes, terrified, as if rooted to the spot by unseen forces. Dee struggles to roll over and change the controls on his gun, which fell out of his hand as he hit the ground, a weapon likely designed for dealing with threats beyond human comprehension. The other INS agents burst over the rise, shouting questions, their training unprepared for intergalactic encounters. From over the rise, car engines whine in the distance and headlights start to flash around them, signaling the arrival of backup or potential reinforcements. Kay reaches into his pocket and pulls out a tubular metallic device the size of a pocket recorder, a tool possibly used for communication or controlling the situation with advanced technology.

From over the rise car engines whine in the distance and headlights start to flash around them. Kay reaches into his pocket and pulls out a tubular metallic device the size of a pocket recorder.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: He squirts some wiper fluid onto the glass which clears it up a bit but now he sees something worse up ahead. It is a grouping of headlights eight of them all pointed at him sealing off the road. He bites his lip and calls over his shoulder to the back of the van. He speaks in Spanish which is subtitled. The Agents fling open the rear doors revealing a dozen frightened Mexicans hopeful immigrants without official permission. Agent Janus looks at the Driver who is now held by two other Agents and shakes his head. He stops in the middle of his sentence as another car is approaching fast its engine whining as it barrels down the road toward them. The new car pulls a hard right goes off the road spins around the INS cars and squeals to a sideways halt silhouetted in front of their headlights. It is a boxy black 1986 Ford LTD. Two men get out dressed in plain black suits crisp white shirts simple black ties shiny black shoes. Kay fiftyish is the apotheosis of worldweary. his partner. Dee midsixties is just weary. They approach the INS agents. Kay and Dee move past him and approach the row of nervous immigrants. He walks down the row studying the faces greeting each one cheerily in Spanish. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. Silence on the road. The others pile into the rear and they tear out of there. Kay and Dee escort their captive across the road and over a small rise leaving the stunned INS agents standing alone in the roadway. He pulls out a small laser device which he zips neatly down the front of the man's clothes. The man's clothes fall to the ground revealing what he really is underneath—a scaly space bastard about fourandahalf feet tall with a snout snaillike tentacles and independently moving eyes on stalks at the top of his head. It is propped up by a stick like a puppet and it continues to make expressions as he holds it. Mikey replies—an unfathomable combination of grunts squeaks and saliva. Mikey makes a lame squeak. From behind Mikey they hear a terrified gasp. Kay and Dee both look over quickly. One of the alien's eyes on a tall stalk whips around too. All three of them see Agent Janus standing just over the rise staring in frozen amazement. Janus freezes terrified. Dee struggles to roll over and change the controls on his gun which fell out of his hand as he hit the ground. The other INS agents burst over the rise shouting questions. From over the rise car engines whine in the distance and headlights start to flash around them. Kay reaches into his pocket and pulls out a tubular metallic device the size of a pocket recorder.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She twists some cookie dough onto the plate, which sweetens it up a bit, but now she tastes something stranger nearby. It's a cluster of cupcakes, ten of them, all arranged around her, blocking the table. She smirks and whispers over her elbow, to the kitchen corner. She mumbles in French, which is interpreted. The Chefs toss open the cupboard doors, revealing a dozen terrified lobsters, confused crustaceans without aquatic habitats. Chef Oliver glances at the Baker, who's now surrounded by two other Chefs, and shrugs his shoulders. She pauses in the middle of her story, as another oven is heating up, loudly, its timer ticking as it roars through the kitchen toward them. The new oven makes a sharp left, slides off the counter, bounces around the kitchen equipment, and clunks to a diagonal rest, outlined in front of their cupcake display. It's a chunky, blue 1975 General Electric. Two cooks get out, clad in colorful red aprons, patterned green shirts, bright orange hats, fuzzy red slippers. Lee, fortyish, is the epitome of kitchen-fatigued; her companion, Max, mid-seventies, is just plain exhausted. They approach the pastry team. Lee and Max slide past her and approach the line of eager crustaceans. She strolls down the line, examining the shells, greeting each one pleasantly in French. Silence in the kitchen. The rest dive into the cupboard and they scuttle out of there. Lee and Max guide their prisoner across the kitchen and past a small counter, leaving the bewildered pastry team standing alone in the kitchen. She pulls out a small rotary tool, which she slices neatly down the side of the lobster's shell. The lobster's shell drops to the floor, revealing what it truly is underneath—a fluffy space critter, about three-and-a-half feet wide, with a beak, feathery tendrils, and individually blinking eyes on stalks at the top of its body. It's propped up by a broom, like a marionette, and it continues to blink as she holds it. Squiggy responds—a mysterious blend of clicks, whistles, and drool. Squiggy makes a feeble whistle. From beside Squiggy, they hear a horrified gasp. Lee and Max both glance over swiftly. One of the critter's eyes, on a short stalk, swivels around too. All three of them see Chef Oliver, standing just past the counter, staring in stunned bewilderment. Oliver freezes, horrified. Max fumbles to flip over and adjust the settings on his spatula, which slid out of his grip as he hit the floor. The other pastry chefs race past the counter, yelling queries. From past the counter, blender motors hum in the background and oven lights begin to flicker around them. Lee reaches into her apron and pulls out a cylindrical wooden tool the size of a rolling pin.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: The driver squirts wiper fluid on the windshield, revealing a blockade of headlights ahead. Speaking in Spanish, the driver addresses frightened immigrants in the back of the van. As the INS agents secure him, a new car arrives, driven by Kay and Dee, who get out in black suits. They approach the immigrants, greeting them in Spanish. The agents pile back into the van and leave. Kay and Dee escort a captive across the road, using a laser to reveal his true form—a small alien with a scaly appearance. The alien, Mikey, communicates with grunts and squeaks. A gasp is heard from behind, and Agent Janus is stunned upon seeing Mikey. Dee tries to regain control over his fallen gun as the other agents rush over. Engines whine and headlights flash around them as Kay pulls out a metallic device from his pocket.
